thread.title: BRUSH/MARIAVICTORIA OBIAS
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by BRUSH/MARIAVICTORIA OBIAS

author: BRUSH/MARIAVICTORIA OBIAS
title: BRUSH/MARIAVICTORIA OBIAS
text:
Burma, did above and beyond his duties in helping me obtain my booking so I can go with the group to this pilgrimage. The tour director gave up, because my fare got too expensive...because of his help I will join the group in France. Thank you sssooo much, Burma...I will send clients your way...please extend your help to them...
Vikki
